column3: “Smells so much sweeter than most strains I've tried. Can get more sativa notes and flavors on this hybrid than indica. Definitely a more social strain, good for getting chatty and staying mellowed. Just got off OG Kush which I've been vaping for a few weeks to try this. Definitely heavier and more relaxing for night time. Doesn't give nausea and dizziness like OG Kush does once the high fades but definitely makes you...”
